name: AaveOracle
description: AaveOracle. Contract to get asset prices, manage price sources and update the fallback oracle - Use of Chainlink Aggregators as first source of price - If the returned price by a Chainlink aggregator is <= 0, the call is forwarded to a fallback oracle - Owned by the Aave governance.

eventDecorators.name: AssetSourceUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted after the price source of an asset is updated.

parameterDecorators.name: source
parameterDecorators.description: The price source of the asset.

eventDecorators.name: BaseCurrencySet
eventDecorators.description: Emitted after the base currency is set.

parameterDecorators.name: baseCurrency
parameterDecorators.description: The base currency of used for price quotes.

parameterDecorators.name: baseCurrencyUnit
parameterDecorators.description: The unit of the base currency.

eventDecorators.name: FallbackOracleUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted after the address of fallback oracle is updated.

parameterDecorators.name: fallbackOracle
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the fallback oracle.

functionDecorators.name: getAssetPrice
functionDecorators.description: Returns the asset price in the base currency.

functionDecorators.name: getAssetsPrices
functionDecorators.description: Returns a list of prices from a list of assets addresses.

returnDecorators.description: The prices of te given assets.

functionDecorators.name: getFallbackOracle
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the fallback oracle.

returnDecorators.description: The address of the fallback oracle.

functionDecorators.name: getSourceOfAsset
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the source for an asset address.

functionDecorators.name: setAssetSources
functionDecorators.description: External function called by the Aave governance to set or replace sources of assets.

parameterDecorators.name: sources
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the source of each asset.

functionDecorators.name: setFallbackOracle
functionDecorators.description: Sets the fallback oracle - Callable only by the Aave governance.

parameterDecorators.name: fallbackOracle
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the fallback oracle.
